name: Support
description: Configuration for support request handling in the bot.

supportChannelID.name: Support Channel ID
supportChannelID.description: The ID of the channel where people can ask questions & get answers for. Leave empty to disable.

enableTicketSystem.name: Enable Ticket System
enableTicketSystem.description: Enable the ticket system for handling support requests.

ticketCategoryID.name: Ticket Category ID
ticketCategoryID.description: The ID of the category where tickets will be created. Leave empty to disable.

ticketCategories.name: Ticket Categories
ticketCategories.description: Here’s a list of categories for tickets, formatted as follows: categoryName:supportTeamID:formName. This format defines the name of the ticket category, the role your support team is responsible for that category, and the form the user must answer before opening a ticket. For example, ‘General Support:123456789012345678:General Support Form’.

ticketWelcomeMessage.name: Ticket Welcome Message
ticketWelcomeMessage.description: The message sent to users when they open a ticket. Placeholders like {userDisplayName}, {ticketID}, {categoryName} can be used to personalize the message.

autoCloseTicketsAfter.name: Auto Close Tickets After (days)
autoCloseTicketsAfter.description: The number of days after which inactive tickets will be automatically closed. Set to 0 to disable auto-closing.

mentionSupportTeam.name: Mention Support Team
mentionSupportTeam.description: Whether to mention the support team in ticket notifications.

autoSaveTranscripts.name: Auto Save Transcripts
autoSaveTranscripts.description: Whether to automatically save transcripts of closed tickets. Disabled will ask users if they want to save the transcript when closing a ticket.

helpUserWithTicket.name: Help User with Ticket
helpUserWithTicket.description: Whether to help users with their tickets by providing assistance or guidance with the help of AI.
